ad_text: Weddle Enterprises Inc Sponsored Heavy Equipment Mechanic Experienced Heavy Equipment Mechanic. 10 years + Experience with ability to manage entire maintenance crew and fleet. Overhaul and test machines or equipment to ensure operating efficiency. Possess excellent knowledge and skill of electrical and hydraulic system repairs. Weld or solder broken parts and structural members, using electric or gas welders. Willing to work overtime when needed and able to fill out reports and maintenance records as necessary. Has the ability to work with and properly maintain various hand and power tools in a safe manner and is able to maintain and clean and safe work area at all times.
